works.description: Alexander Amosu, known for his uber-cool bling-bling creations, is back again with yet another striking creation – a 24ct Gold Kindle. The Kindle e-reader with an amazing display enjoys the most 5-star reviews of any product on Amazon. The Kindle (Wi-Fi + 3G) in 24ct hardened gold costs £1,199 ($1,950) through Amosu Couture, and is available in 24ct yellow, white or rose gold, along with the optional Swarovski crystals. Each unit can also be personalized and engraved, as a special request with a customized carry case.
